cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.5)

project(libskia)

# Check if the major CMakeLists.txt file has correctly set
# the ANDROID_ROOT directory.
if (IS_DIRECTORY ${ANDROID_ROOT})
    message(STATUS "${PROJECT_NAME}, has been set android root")
else ()
    if (IS_DIRECTORY ${BUILD_NATIVE_ROOT})
        message(WARNING "${PROJECT_NAME}, set ANDROID_ROOT via BUILD_NATIVE_ROOT=${BUILD_NATIVE_ROOT}")
        set(ANDROID_ROOT ${BUILD_NATIVE_ROOT})
        set(OUT_INTERMEDIATES_ROOT ${ANDROID_ROOT}/out/soong/.intermediates)
    else ()
        message(FATAL_ERROR "${PROJECT_NAME}, ANDROID_ROOT was NULL")
    endif ()
endif ()

#################### libskia ####################

        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/src/text/gpu/Slug.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/src/text/gpu/StrikeCache.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/src/text/gpu/SubRunAllocator.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/src/text/gpu/SubRunContainer.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/src/text/gpu/TextBlob.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/src/text/gpu/TextBlobRedrawCoordinator.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/tools/SkSharingProc.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/src/opts/SkOpts_crc32.cpp
)
set(SOURCE_FILES "")
foreach (file ${FILES})
    if (EXISTS ${file})
        list(APPEND SOURCE_FILES ${file})
    endif ()
endforeach ()

if (NOT SOURCE_FILES)
    message(WARNING "${PROJECT_NAME}, source files not exist")
else ()
    add_library(libskia SHARED ${SOURCE_FILES})

    target_include_directories(libskia
            PUBLIC
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/android
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/client_utils/android
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/android
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/codec
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/config
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/core
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/docs
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/effects
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/encode
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/gpu
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/pathops
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/ports
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/svg
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/utils
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/utils/mac
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/modules/skottie/include
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/modules/skparagraph/include
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/modules/skshaper/include
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/modules/svg/include
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/third_party/vulkanmemoryallocator
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/vma_android/include
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/modules/skcms
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/third_party/libtiff
    )

    # Add c/c++ flags
    target_compile_options(libskia PRIVATE
            -Werror
            -Wno-unused-parameter
            -Wno-unused-variable
            -DFLYME_GRAPHICS_EXTEND
    )

    target_link_libraries(libskia
            libEGL
            libGLESv2
            libarect
            libc
            libc++_static
            libc++demangle
            libclang_rt.builtins
            libcutils
            libdl
            libdng_sdk
            libexpat
            libft2
            libheif
            libjpeg
            liblog
            libm
            libnativewindow
            libperfetto_client_experimental
            libpiex
            libpng
            libsfntly
            libtiff
            libvulkan
            libwebp-decode
            libwebp-encode
            libwinpthread
            libwuffs_mirror_release_c
            libz
    )
endif ()
#################### libskia ####################

#################### libskqp_jni ####################
set(FILES
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/gm/3d.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/gm/aaa.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/gm/aaclip.cpp

        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/gm/aarectmodes.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/gm/aaxfermodes.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/gm/addarc.cpp

        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/tools/skqp/src/jni_skqp.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/tools/skqp/src/skqp.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/tools/skqp/src/skqp_GpuTestProcs.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/tools/timer/Timer.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/third_party/vulkanmemoryallocator/GrVulkanMemoryAllocator.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/src/opts/SkOpts_crc32.cpp
)
set(SOURCE_FILES "")
foreach (file ${FILES})
    if (EXISTS ${file})
        list(APPEND SOURCE_FILES ${file})
    endif ()
endforeach ()

if (NOT SOURCE_FILES)
    message(WARNING "${PROJECT_NAME}, source files not exist")
else ()
    add_library(libskqp_jni SHARED ${SOURCE_FILES})

    target_include_directories(libskqp_jni
            PUBLIC
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/skqp
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/third_party/vulkanmemoryallocator
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/vma_android/include
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/client_utils/android
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/android
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/codec
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/config
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/core
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/docs
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/effects
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/encode
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/gpu
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/pathops
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/ports
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/svg
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/third_party/vulkan
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/utils
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/utils/mac
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/modules/skottie/include
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/modules/skparagraph/include
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/modules/sksg/include
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/modules/skshaper/include
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/modules/svg/include
    )

    # Add c/c++ flags
    target_compile_options(libskqp_jni PRIVATE
            -Werror
            -Wno-unused-parameter
            -Wno-unused-variable
            -Wno-unused-parameter
            -Wno-unused-variable
    )

    target_link_libraries(libskqp_jni
            jni_headers
            libEGL
            libGLESv2
            libandroid
            libc
            libc++_static
            libc++demangle
            libclang_rt.builtins
            libclang_rt.ubsan_minimal
            libdl
            libexpat
            libjpeg_static_ndk
            liblog
            libm
            libpng_ndk
            libvulkan
            libwebp-decode
            libwebp-encode
            libwuffs_mirror_release_c
            libz
    )
endif ()
#################### libskqp_jni ####################

#################### libskia_renderengine ####################

        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/src/utils/SkOrderedFontMgr.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/src/utils/SkPaintFilterCanvas.cpp

        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/src/utils/SkShaderUtils.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/src/utils/SkShadowTessellator.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/src/utils/SkShadowUtils.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/src/utils/SkTextUtils.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/src/utils/SkVMVisualizer.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/src/utils/mac/SkCTFont.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/src/utils/mac/SkCreateCGImageRef.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/src/utils/win/SkAutoCoInitialize.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/src/utils/win/SkDWrite.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/src/utils/win/SkDWriteFontFileStream.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/src/utils/win/SkDWriteGeometrySink.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/src/utils/win/SkHRESULT.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/src/utils/win/SkIStream.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/src/utils/win/SkWGL_win.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/tools/SkSharingProc.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/third_party/vulkanmemoryallocator/GrVulkanMemoryAllocator.cpp
        ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/src/opts/SkOpts_crc32.cpp
)
set(SOURCE_FILES "")
foreach (file ${FILES})
    if (EXISTS ${file})
        list(APPEND SOURCE_FILES ${file})
    endif ()
endforeach ()

if (NOT SOURCE_FILES)
    message(WARNING "${PROJECT_NAME}, source files not exist")
else ()
    add_library(libskia_renderengine SHARED ${SOURCE_FILES})

    target_include_directories(libskia_renderengine
            PUBLIC
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/client_utils/android
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/android
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/codec
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/config
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/core
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/docs
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/effects
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/encode
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/gpu
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/pathops
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/ports
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/svg
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/utils
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/include/utils/mac
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/modules/skottie/include
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/modules/skparagraph/include
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/modules/skshaper/include
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/modules/svg/include
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/renderengine
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/third_party/vulkanmemoryallocator
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/vma_android/include
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/modules/skcms
            ${ANDROID_ROOT}/external/skia/third_party/libtiff
    )

    # Add c/c++ flags
    target_compile_options(libskia_renderengine PRIVATE
            -Werror
            -Wno-unused-parameter
            -Wno-unused-variable
            -DFLYME_GRAPHICS_EXTEND
    )

    target_link_libraries(libskia_renderengine
            libEGL
            libGLESv2
            libarect
            libc
            libc++_static
            libc++demangle
            libclang_rt.builtins
            libcutils
            libdl
            liblog
            libm
            libnativewindow
            libperfetto_client_experimental
            libpng
            libtiff
            libvulkan
            libz
    )
endif ()
#################### libskia_renderengine ####################
